garden.title: Welcome to Your Prompt Library
garden.description: Each prompt is a valuable resource. Explore and utilize them!

empty.title: Your prompt library is empty.
empty.description: Go to the 'Prompt Library' to add new prompts!

addTask.title: Add a New Prompt
addTask.description: This will add a new prompt to your library. Refine it for better results!

editTask.title: Edit Prompt
editTask.description: Make changes to your prompt here. Click save when you're done.

validation.nameRequired: Prompt title must be at least 3 characters.

list.title: Your Prompts
list.description: Here are all the prompts in your library.
list.empty: Add a prompt above to get started!

addTask.title: Prompt added!
addTask.description: Your new prompt "{taskName}" has been added to the library.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently remove the prompt "{taskName}" from your library. This action cannot be undone.

growthStages.title: Prompt Refinement Stages
growthStages.description: Distribution of your prompts by refinement stage.

plantVariety.title: Prompt Categories
plantVariety.description: The categories of prompts in your library.

customize.title: Customize Your Library
customize.description: Personalize your experience. More themes and prompt categories are on the way!

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon!
comingSoon.description: This area will allow you to choose new prompt display styles and library themes to make your prompt management space truly yours.

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application.

theme.title: Appearance
theme.description: Choose a theme for the application.
